official_title: A bill to abolish the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries established by section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

summary.text: Abolishes the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries established by the Federal Salary Act of 1967. (Repeals 2 U.S.C. 351)
